channel.description:

Please dont post harsh comments. Please no spamming/cussing
thanks alaska121

item.title: PS3- L A Noire
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Looks great if you’re into that sort of game, too linear for me though.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3- L A Noire
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

tL:

Yep. Different developers though, so not entirely surprising.

LA Noire’s PC version is being developed by Rockstar Leeds though, not Team Bondi (hell, most of Rockstar’s studios did work on the game as well, including Rockstar North). Just like GTA IV’s PC version was developed by Rockstar Toronto, they just get one of their smaller studios to work on them.

Hopefully they get around to it sometime, it would be amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3- L A Noire
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“tL, post:3, topic:400593”]It was disappointing. Great idea, great mechanics. But the lack of structure and any real story just wasn’t compelling enough to keep playing through.

Also, they’ve just announced it is coming to PC![/quote]
They’ve already announced a PC version of LA Noire but still no Red Dead Redemption? Bullshit.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3- L A Noire
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

It was disappointing. Great idea, great mechanics. But the lack of structure and any real story just wasn’t compelling enough to keep playing through.

Also, they’ve just announced it is coming to PC!
